attributes.action: fund, through a scientific/engineering grant or prize, the development of a Water Fuel Cell.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition will force the government to develop for domestic commercial and industrial use, a water fuel cell which will produce hydrogen gas from sea water to fuel power stations, commercial buildings and internal combustion engines, to be commercially available within 10 years in order to protect the environment and the economy from oil and gas shortages.
